page.title: 03HOME FARM
page.content:
Goodwood farm is called Home Farm. There are six houses where the farm managers and workers live, one barn and some follows - on pens at the back of the farm. there is also a tractor shed and a large shed round the back where we keep the combine harvesters and a workshop next door.
The three fields behind the farm are for cows and sheep. There are also two bulls and some Suffolk rams. The herd of Friesen dairy cows are in another two fields, and nearby is the dairy. There is one house for the milkman, a barn and a dairy shed. Wood from the forest behind the farm is used for fencing and repairs.
By Heather E
